result.arabic_text: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
result.translation: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo! Nimushishikare mwumvira Imana Allah, mwumvira n’Intumwa yayo, kandi ntimugatume ibikorwa vyanyu bicika impfagusa ku guca kubiri n’amabwirizwa yayo.
